definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
fired power plant (i.e. fired by coal, oil or gas)

sentences.english: The new Enel plant here opens its first boiler in two months.
sentences.chinese: 二個月後，埃奈爾電廠的第一個新鍋爐將會啓用。

sentences.english: As the macro-scale fundamental construction, thermal power electricity generation has important impact on national economy.
sentences.chinese: 火力發電廠的經濟性主要取決於電站鍋爐的熱效率。

sentences.english: Water passed through bottom discharges of the plant.
sentences.chinese: 水流通過電廠底部的泄水孔排出。

sentences.english: The accident took place at a power plant in Fengcheng where a cooling tower was under construction.
sentences.chinese: 事故發生在江西豐城一處電廠，正在修建一座冷卻塔。

sentences.english: A concrete plan in the power factory using waste incinerating is developed.
sentences.chinese: 並給出在垃圾焚燒發電廠的具體實施方案。

sentences.english: And this is a powerplant to supply all those other plants with electricity.
sentences.chinese: 這個電廠向其他所有工廠提供電力。

sentences.english: Objective:To make clear of the composition of gangue-combustion fly ash under 70μm and benefit its comprehensive utilization.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解矸石電廠粉煤灰的組成，指導其綜合利用。

sentences.english: Using the said technology in Hanchuan Power Plant, good effectiveness has been obtained.
sentences.chinese: 漢川電廠採用這一技術已取得了良好的效果。

sentences.english: Air-cooled power plant is widely used in "rich coal-water" areas.
sentences.chinese: 空冷電廠廣泛應用於“富煤缺水”地區。

sentences.english: A membrane filtrating technology for coal- sluicing wastewater at coal-fired power plants is described.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種處理燃煤電廠衝煤廢水的膜式過濾技術。

sentences.english: The ratio of corrective to preventive maintenance is high relative to best performing NPPs of similar design…
sentences.chinese: 的比例相對而言高於設計相似且實績最佳的核電廠。

sentences.english: The basic requirements in nuclear safety review are clarified for class 1E cables of nu- clear power plants.
sentences.chinese: 闡明對核電廠1E級電纜核安全審查的基本要求。

sentences.english: Macao beach facilities, power plants and oil storage tank anti-corrosion.
sentences.chinese: 澳門電廠海邊設施及原油儲油罐防腐。

sentences.english: Tom's father works in the radio factory.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆的父親在無線電廠工作。

sentences.english: Feed-water and anti-surge devices are also used in power stations.
sentences.chinese: 電廠也要使用給水和減縱蕩裝置。

sentences.english: With the completion of a thermal power plant and a gas works in the near future.
sentences.chinese: 另有一座熱電廠和煤氣廠也即將先後建成。

definition: a power station/an electricity generating plant
to generate electricity/to send a telegram
fuel gas (coal gas, natural gas, methane etc)
